snippet: The prisonlike conditions on Kabul bases often drive service members to extremes to escape the pressure and keep up their spirits. Sometimes that escape is a plate of French cheese.
abstract: The prisonlike conditions on Kabul bases often drive service members to extremes to escape the pressure and keep up their spirits. Sometimes that escape is a plate of French cheese.

headline.main: The Best, and Worst, in Kabul Military Dining
